name: Vegetable Stock
recipeIngredient: 50 g bulb of fennel (very thinly sliced),
10 white peppercorns (crushed and wrapped in muslin),
recipeInstructions: 1. Put all the ingredients except the peppercorns into a saucepan.
2. Bring to the boil over a high heat, then reduce immediately to a simmer.
3. Cook at a bare simmer for 45 minutes.
4. After 35 minutes add the muslin wrapped peppercorns.
5. Strain and cool as quickly as possible.
